column1: The Pit Room////OUTSTANDING! I had never in my life had Texas Barbecue before
column2: but this place set the bar REALLY HIGH for me. I had the Chicken
column3: Brisket and Pork Ribs with the Mac and Cheese and Charred Okra. All the meats were super good
column4: but it was the brisket that made me say
column5: "I'd never had brisket the "correct way" before I had it at the Pit Room." Sliced like cutting through butter.
